info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Finds the number of occurences into measure array that are inside the interval [value-distance;value+distance].
[Parameters] - input measure type : Ophidia typing. Supported types are: 'oph_double'; 'oph_float'; 'oph_long'; 'oph_int'; 'oph_short'; 'oph_byte'. - output measure type : not used. - measure : input measure. - value : center of the interval. - distance : half-width of the interval.
[Return type] Long-long.
[Examples] Finds the number of occurences into measure array that are inside the interval [5;15]. oph_find('OPH_DOUBLE','',measure,10,5)
